scripts.postinit: node .bin/index css2scss && node .bin/index install && npm run init:extras
scripts.init:extras: cd $npm_package_config_project && pwd && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.presetup: echo "Warning: may need to update this script from time to time"
scripts.precra: npx -y rimraf cra-legacy-app cra-v16-app cra-v17-app cra-v18-app
scripts.cra: npx -y npm-run-all cra:legacy cra:v16 cra:v17 cra:v18
scripts.precra:legacy:init: mkdir cra-legacy-app && cd cra-legacy-app && npm init -y
scripts._cra:legacy:init: cd cra-legacy-app && npm pkg set dependencies['react']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-dom']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-scripts']='2.1.3'
scripts.post-cra:legacy:init: cd cra-legacy-app && npm pkg set scripts['start']='react-scripts start' && npm pkg set scripts['build']='react-scripts build' && npm pkg set scripts['test']='react-scripts test' && npm pkg set scripts['eject']='react-scripts eject'
scripts._cra:legacy:setup: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/legacy/cra-template-typescript/template ./cra-legacy-app && cd cra-legacy-app && npm i sass --save-dev
scripts.cra:legacy:setup: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/legacy/cra-template-typescript/template ./cra-legacy-app && cd cra-legacy-app && npm i react@16.7 react-dom@16.7 react-scripts@2.1.3 sass
scripts.postcra:legacy:setup: node .bin/index css2scss && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/legacy/src ./cra-legacy-app/src && npm run cra:legacy:extras
scripts.precra:legacy:extras: cd cra-legacy-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*' && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:legacy:extras: node -e "require('fs').rename('cra-legacy-app/gitignore', 'cra-legacy-app/.gitignore', (e) => { if (e) console.log(e); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.pre-cra:legacy:start: cd cra-legacy-app && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run test
scripts.cra:legacy:start: cd cra-legacy-app && pwd && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
scripts.post-cra:legacy:start: cd cra-legacy-app && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm start
scripts.precra:v16:init: mkdir cra-v16-app && cd cra-v16-app && npm init -y
scripts.post-cra:v16:init: cd cra-v16-app && npm pkg set scripts['start']='react-scripts start' && npm pkg set scripts['build']='react-scripts build' && npm pkg set scripts['test']='react-scripts test' && npm pkg set scripts['eject']='react-scripts eject'
scripts.cra:v16:setup: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v16/cra-template-typescript/template ./cra-v16-app && cd cra-v16-app && npm i react@16 react-dom@16 react-scripts@4.0.3 sass
scripts.postcra:v16:setup: node .bin/index css2scss && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v16/src ./cra-v16-app/src && npm run cra:v16:extras
scripts.precra:v16:extras: cd cra-v16-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*' && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:v16:extras: node -e "require('fs').rename('cra-v16-app/gitignore', 'cra-v16-app/.gitignore', (e) => { if (e) console.log(e); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.pre-cra:v16:start: cd cra-v16-app && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run test
scripts.cra:v16:start: cd cra-v16-app && pwd && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
scripts.post-cra:v16:start: cd cra-v16-app && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm start
scripts.precra:v17:init: mkdir cra-v17-app && cd cra-v17-app && npm init -y
scripts.post-cra:v17:init: cd cra-v17-app && npm pkg set scripts['start']='react-scripts start' && npm pkg set scripts['build']='react-scripts build' && npm pkg set scripts['test']='react-scripts test' && npm pkg set scripts['eject']='react-scripts eject'
scripts.cra:v17:setup: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v17/cra-template-typescript/template ./cra-v17-app && cd cra-v17-app && npm i react@17 react-dom@17 react-scripts sass
scripts.postcra:v17:setup: node .bin/index css2scss && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v17/src ./cra-v17-app/src && npm run cra:v17:extras
scripts.precra:v17:extras: cd cra-v17-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*' && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:v17:extras: node -e "require('fs').rename('cra-v17-app/gitignore', 'cra-v17-app/.gitignore', (e) => { if (e) console.log(e); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.cra:v17:start: cd cra-v17-app && pwd && npm run build
scripts.precra:v18:init: mkdir cra-v18-app && cd cra-v18-app && npm init -y
scripts.post-cra:v18:init: cd cra-v18-app && npm pkg set scripts['start']='react-scripts start' && npm pkg set scripts['build']='react-scripts build' && npm pkg set scripts['test']='react-scripts test' && npm pkg set scripts['eject']='react-scripts eject'
scripts.cra:v18:setup: npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v18/cra-template-typescript/template ./cra-v18-app && cd cra-v18-app && npm i react@18 react-dom@18 react-scripts sass
scripts.postcra:v18:setup: node .bin/index css2scss && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v18/src ./cra-v18-app/src && npm run cra:v18:extras
scripts.precra:v18:extras: cd cra-v18-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*' && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.cra:v18:extras: node -e "require('fs').rename('cra-v18-app/gitignore', 'cra-v18-app/.gitignore', (e) => { if (e) console.log(e); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.cra:v18:start: cd cra-v18-app && pwd && npm run build
scripts.postcra:v18:cli: node .bin/index css2scss && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/cra/v18/src ./cra-v18-app/src && npm run cra:v18:extras
scripts.postvite: node .bin/index css2scss $npm_package_config_project/src && npx -y ncp ./.tmp/vite ./$npm_package_config_project && npm run vite:install
scripts.previte:all: npx -y rimraf wsk-vite-v5-app wsk-vite-v4-app wsk-vite-v3-app wsk-vite-v2-app wsk-vite-legacy-app
scripts.vite:all: npx -y npm-run-all vite:v5 vite:v4 vite:v3 vite:v2 vite:legacy
scripts.postvite:all: npx -y npm-run-all vite:v5:setup vite:v4:setup vite:v3:setup vite:v2:setup vite:legacy:setup
scripts.vite:v5:setup: cd wsk-vite-v5-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
scripts.postvite:v5:setup: cd wsk-vite-v5-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.vite:v4:setup: cd wsk-vite-v4-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
scripts.postvite:v4:setup: cd wsk-vite-v4-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.vite:v3:setup: cd wsk-vite-v3-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
scripts.postvite:v3:setup: cd wsk-vite-v3-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.vite:v2:setup: cd wsk-vite-v2-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
scripts.postvite:v2:setup: cd wsk-vite-v2-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.postvite:v1: cd wsk-vite-v1-app && npm pkg set dependencies['react']='^16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-dom']='^16.7.0' && npm pkg set devDependencies['@types/react']='^16.7.0' && npm pkg set devDependencies['@types/react-dom']='^16.7.0' && npm i sass --save-dev
scripts.vite:v1:setup: cd wsk-vite-v1-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
scripts.postvite:v1:setup: cd wsk-vite-v1-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
scripts.postvite:legacy: cd wsk-vite-legacy-app && npm pkg set dependencies['react']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-dom']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set devDependencies['@types/react']='^16.9.0' && npm pkg set devDependencies['@types/react-dom']='^16.9.0' && npm i sass --save-dev
scripts.vite:legacy:setup: cd wsk-vite-legacy-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
scripts.postvite:legacy:setup: cd wsk-vite-legacy-app && npm link react-library stencil-library

commands.vite:legacy:setup: cd wsk-vite-legacy-app && npm pkg set dependencies['stencil-library']='*' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-library']='*'
commands.postvite:legacy:setup: cd wsk-vite-legacy-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
commands.post-cra: npm run cra:init:pkg && npm run cra:install
commands.postcra:copy:prj: node -e "require('fs').rename(process.env.npm_package_config_project+'/gitignore', process.env.npm_package_config_project+'/.gitignore', (e) => { if (e) console.log(e); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
commands.precra:update:pkg: cd $npm_package_config_project && npm i react@16 react-dom@16 react-scripts@4.0.1 --legacy-peer-deps
commands.cra:update:pkg:legacy: cd $npm_package_config_project && npm pkg set dependencies['react']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-dom']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-scripts']='3.2.0'
commands.cra:init:pkg: cd $npm_package_config_project && npm init -y && npm pkg set dependencies['react']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-dom']='16.7.0' && npm pkg set dependencies['react-scripts']='3.2.0'
commands._postcra:install: cd $npm_package_config_project && npm i react@16 react-dom@16 react-scripts@
commands.cra:start: cd $npm_package_config_project && npm run build && npm start
commands.precra:start:legacy: cd $npm_package_config_project && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build
commands.cra:all: npx -y npm-run-all cra:legacy cra:v16 cra:v17 cra:v18
commands.cra:legacy: mkdir wsk-cra-legacy-app && cd wsk-cra-legacy-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16.7 react-dom@16.7 react-scripts@3.2.0
commands.precra:legacy:extras: node .bin/index cra legacy wsk-cra-legacy-app && cd wsk-cra-legacy-app && npm i
commands.cra:legacy:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-legacy-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
commands.cra:v16: mkdir wsk-cra-v16-app && cd wsk-cra-v16-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16 react-dom@16
commands.precra:v16:extras: node .bin/index cra v16 wsk-cra-v16-app && cd wsk-cra-v16-app && npm i
commands.cra:v16:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-v16-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
commands.cra:v17: mkdir wsk-cra-v17-app && cd wsk-cra-v17-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16 react-dom@16
commands.precra:v17:extras: node .bin/index cra v17 wsk-cra-v17-app && cd wsk-cra-v17-app && npm i
commands.cra:v17:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-v17-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
commands.cra:v18: mkdir wsk-cra-v18-app && cd wsk-cra-v18-app && npm init -y && npm i react@16 react-dom@16
commands.precra:v18:extras: node .bin/index cra v18 wsk-cra-v18-app && cd wsk-cra-v18-app && npm i
commands.cra:v18:extras: node .bin/index link && cd wsk-cra-v18-app && npm link react-library stencil-library
